definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
thick paste of fermented soybean/marinated in soy paste/paste/jam

sentences.english: Alterna Professional Haircare uses caviar extract in its Caviar Anti-Aging collection.
sentences.chinese: 替代专业护发品使用鱼子酱提取的鱼子酱抗衰老收集。

sentences.english: Alterna Professional Haircare uses caviar extract in its Caviar Anti-Aging collection.
sentences.chinese: 替代专业护发品使用鱼子酱提取的鱼子酱抗衰老收集。

sentences.english: OK, I'll see if I can find him some caviar.
sentences.chinese: 知道了，那我去找找看家里有没有鱼子酱为他准备。

sentences.english: Popcorn and cokes beneath the stars became champagne and caviar.
sentences.chinese: 可口可乐和爆米花赛过香槟和鱼子酱。

sentences.english: All right. We'll have some cheese wafers and caviar.
sentences.chinese: 我们点一些干酪薄脆饼和鱼子酱。

sentences.english: Skewer of lobster grilled on a plancha, topped with fennel, coral of sea urchin and caviar.
sentences.chinese: 香烤龙虾串，玉米面糊配海胆，茴香和鱼子酱。

sentences.english: And nappy cream is like caviar for toddles, best served straight from the bottom.
sentences.chinese: 尿布霜对蹒跚学步的小孩子就有如鱼子酱。

sentences.english: Baked Tournedos of Salmon, Caviar, Olysters with Parma Ham.
sentences.chinese: 焗三文鱼，鱼子酱，生蚝配帕尔马火腿。

sentences.english: The combination of these exclusive caviars are perfect for a caviar tasting, and make an elegant gift.
sentences.chinese: 如果把这三种鱼子酱混在一起，味道更始别具一格。

sentences.english: Caviar has been considered a delicacy meant to be served with hors d' oeuvres .
sentences.chinese: 鱼子酱已经被认为是一个微妙意味著餐前须送达小食。

sentences.english: Unless you have a little caviare.
I knew I could not afford caviar, but I could not very well tell her that.
sentences.chinese: 我知道我吃不起鱼子酱，但是却说不出口。

sentences.english: Offers Alaskan salmon, king crab, shrimp, caviar, and more.
sentences.chinese: 提供阿拉斯加三文鱼，皇帝蟹，虾，鱼子酱，和更多。

sentences.english: Australian rock lobster with timbale of green vegetable, crabmeat, caviar and bell pepper coulis.
sentences.chinese: 澳洲龙虾配蔬菜挞，蟹肉，鱼子酱及甜椒汁。

sentences.english: I knew I could not afford caviare.
sentences.chinese: 我知道我是吃不起鱼子酱的。

sentences.english: Also featured in the line is Alterna Caviar Anti-Aging Volume Molding Crème.
sentences.chinese: 还精选了线替代鱼子酱抗衰老卷成型霜。
